title: Mailtrap
description:
Mailtrap is an Email Delivery Platform which covers all email-related needs in one place: testing, sending, and in-depth tracking to control how emails perform.

Trusted by Atlassian, Calendly, PayPal, Atlassian, TopTal, Stack Overflow and others, Mailtrap provides customers with a reliable end-to-end sending solution so you can be sure that emails will land into your buyers' inboxes in time. Plus, users get a robust analytics toolset for complete control over their email deliverability. And there are Regular Weekly and Critical deliverability alerts to stay on top of all major email data.
